description: This Python source file defines an AI agent with integrated knowledge base capabilities, including setup, configuration, and usage instructions for building a knowledge-searching agent using the Agno framework.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: Represents an AI agent capable of performing tasks, configured with models, tools, and instructions.

classes.name: UrlKnowledge
classes.description: Represents a knowledge base sourced from URLs, with vector database integration.

classes.name: LanceDb
classes.description: A vector database implementation using LanceDB for storing and searching embeddings.

classes.name: OpenAIChat
classes.description: A model wrapper for OpenAI's chat models.

methods.name: print_response
methods.description: Outputs the agent's response to a given prompt, optionally streaming the output.
